name: Create/Update new contacts in HubSpot from new form submissions in Swipe Pages
description:
This template periodically checks for new form submissions in Swipe Pages and uses the retrieved information to create new or update existing contacts in HubSpot CRM.

The template expects your Swipe Pages form to collect at least the following information:
1) Email
2) First name
3) Last name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
